description: This Dart file defines a reusable Flutter widget called GlassContainer that creates a frosted glass effect using backdrop filter and other styling options. It enhances UI with a glassmorphism design, customizable via parameters like blur, tint, border, gradient, and tap handling.

classes.name: GlassContainer
classes.description: A reusable frosted glass container widget that applies background blur and semi-transparent tint to achieve a glassmorphism effect.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the GlassContainer, applying blur, tint, optional border, gradient, and handling tap gestures.
